ee wasarema ihalama lakunu labu shishyawanta oste්raliyawe shishyathwayak himiwuna.1988, 89, 90 wasarawala usas pela usas pa්rathipala labu sisuwiyan rusiyawatath paha wasara shishyathwayen wadima lakunu labagath sisuwiyan dedenaku japanayatath, elesama usas pa්rathipala labu sisuwiyan rasak warin wara chinaya, indiyawa wani ratawalatath shishyathwa laba gaththa.kanya soyuriy athulu 150 kata aasanna guru mandalayakin yuthu shantha joshap balikawe sisuwiyange winaya mattamath itha ihalayi.

darshanaya pilibanda lipi malawehi kotasaki darshana wadayehi wyuhaya saha anekuth darshanika shikshanayan kerehi ehi athi sambandhathawaya. chinthana dhara eejipthu ha babiloniyanu pauranika aatha peradiga (china) pauranika indiyanu pauranika grika-roma pauranika parsiyanu madhyakalina yuropiya darshanika gaweshana saha ithihasaya darshana ithihasaya darshanawadaye gatalu nuthana darshana sankalpa ha aagama wirodhayan / mathabhedayan samajiya aacharanaya widyawata ha ganithayata padanamak darshanawadaye kshethrayan bhashawa ha tharkashasthraya gnyanamimansawa adhibhauthika wadaya parinamiya manowidyawa widyawa saha ganithaya aachara dharmaya saundaryya wadaya darshanawadaya · darshanika sampradayayansanskaranaya ee ee sanskruthiye adahas, aakalpa, bhashawa aadiye athi wenaskam nisa, darshanika gataluwe arthayada ee anuwa wenaswi thibiya haka.
